analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#590-642):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenPresale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#608-611)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presale_eth_fund (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#611-612)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#590-642):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenPresale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#608-611)
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenCrowsale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#614-618)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsale_eth_fund (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#630-631)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.doFinalize (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#690-694):
	External calls:
	- createTeamTokenByPercentage() (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#692)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#692)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#692)

Crowdsale.createTeamTokenByPercentage (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#565-585) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(addr,ntoken) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#580-581)

Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#590-642) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#637-638)

Crowdsale.doFinalize (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#690-694) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#692)

Crowdsale.createTeamTokenByPercentage has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(addr,ntoken) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#580-581)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokensCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#590-642):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenPresale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#608-611)
	- tokenAmount = calculateTokenCrowsale(weiAmount,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#614-618)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#627)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#625)

	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/32/0x93fcd82fe7370fb367b7cc48477e93048b14a1ca.sol#631-635)
